text: Tara apanake kiyamata samparke jijnesa kare (bale) ‘ta kakhana ghatabe? [1] Baluna, ‘e bisayera jnana sudhu amara rabera'i nikata. Sudhu tini'i yathasamaye setara prakasa ghatabena; asamanasamuha o yamine seta bhari bisaya [2]. Hathat kare'i ta tomadera upara asabe [3].’ Apani e bisaye sabisesa jnani mane kare tara apanake prasna kare. Baluna, ‘e bisaye jnana sudhu allah‌ra'i nikata, kintu adhikansa loka jane na
